settings.custom_liquid:
<style> 
  #Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_GwPJPQ, 
  #Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_jmapAg, 
  #Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_HMCYaK, 
  #Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_KJ8xtT, 
  #Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_4ECdzY {
    user-select: none; 
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; 
    overflow-x: auto; 
    scroll-snap-type: none;  
    scroll-behavior: smooth; 
  } 
</style>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
  // Only apply drag functionality if screen width is larger than 768px
  if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
    const carousels = document.querySelectorAll(
      '#Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_GwPJPQ, ' + 
      '#Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_jmapAg, ' +
      '#Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_HMCYaK, ' +
      '#Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_KJ8xtT, ' +
      '#Slider-template--23976315027731__featured_collection_4ECdzY'
    );

    carousels.forEach(carousel => {
      let isMouseDown = false;
      let isDragging = false;
      let startX;
      let scrollLeft;

      carousel.style.cursor = 'grab';

      carousel.addEventListener('mousedown', function (e) {
        isMouseDown = true;
        isDragging = false; // Reset dragging state
        startX = e.pageX - carousel.offsetLeft;
        scrollLeft = carousel.scrollLeft;

        setTimeout(() => {
          if (isMouseDown) {
            isDragging = true;
            carousel.style.cursor = 'grabbing';
            carousel.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => link.style.pointerEvents = 'none'); // Disable link clicks
          }
        }, 200); // 0.8 second delay to initiate dragging
      });

      carousel.addEventListener('mouseleave', function () {
        if (isMouseDown) resetState(carousel);
      });

      carousel.addEventListener('mouseup', function () {
        if (isMouseDown) resetState(carousel);
      });

      carousel.addEventListener('mousemove', function (e) {
        if (!isMouseDown || !isDragging) return;

        e.preventDefault(); // Prevent text selection while dragging

        const x = e.pageX - carousel.offsetLeft;
        const walk = x - startX;

        carousel.scrollLeft = scrollLeft - walk;
      });

      carousel.addEventListener('touchstart', function (e) {
        const touchStart = e.touches[0].pageX; 
        let touchMove;

        carousel.addEventListener('touchmove', function (e) {
          touchMove = e.touches[0].pageX; 
          const moveDistance = touchStart - touchMove;
          carousel.scrollLeft += moveDistance;
        });

        carousel.addEventListener('touchend', function () {
          carousel.removeEventListener('touchmove', null);
          carousel.removeEventListener('touchend', null);
        });
      });

      function resetState(carousel) {
        isMouseDown = false;
        isDragging = false;
        carousel.style.cursor = 'grab';
        carousel.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => link.style.pointerEvents = 'auto'); // Re-enable link clicks
      }
    });
  }
});
</script>

settings.title: Ceramic Coffee Cup with Hinged Lid

settings.heading: Shop new Reusable Water Bottles from frank green
settings.row_content:
Need a Reusable Water Bottle with a fresh new look, or want to feast your eyes on the latest designs? You’re in the right place! Whether you’re after a new Reusable Water Bottle or are looking to upgrade your existing one with accessories, you’re sure to find some fresh new vibes right here. 

Whatever you’re looking for, your new frank green water bottle can mix and match your mood, thanks to our blend of subtle and striking colourways. Take a look at our latest arrivals and find your new favourites today (we have!).

settings.heading: Discover new lifestyle products designed with you in mind
settings.row_content:
What good’s a new insulated water bottle, if it doesn’t slot seamlessly into your life? Our multi-award winning designs means every form and function is considered, so you can get the most from your frank green products. There’s always something new to check out here at frank green!

And for the kids, check out our new design water bottle with our franksters™ range, each on a mission to save the planet with their unique super powers one sip at a time! 

And when you’ve caught up on our new arrivals, you can’t go wrong with the classics either! Enjoy a tasty beverage from one of our reusable cups or quench your thirst with one of our reusable bottles, both featuring triple-wall vacuum insulation and ceramic lining to preserve flavour and to retain temperature.

settings.heading: How to clean a new water bottle
settings.row_content:
To give your new insulated water bottle a thorough scrub, follow these few simple steps: 

  1. Fill with warm water and add mild dish soap 
  2. Put the cap back on and shake the bottle 
  3. Remove the cap and scrub the walls and bottom of the bottle with a scrub brush, getting into all those nooks and crannies. Don’t forget to wash around the lip of the bottle, too! 
  4. Wash the cap with dish soap and warm water, then rinse 
  5. Dry the bottle with a paper towel or a clean dish cloth
  6. You’re ready to get sipping!

settings.heading: What are the latest trends in water bottles?
settings.row_content:
The latest water bottle trends are all about standing out and letting your personality shine: Sleek lines, rounded shapes and pops of colour are currently on trend, along with mixing up your lids and bases for a fresh new look.  

And why not make your bottle uniquely yours with some personalisation? Monogram your name or that perfect emoji on the front.

Water bottles are not just for quenching your thirst anymore—they've become style accessories in their own right. At least, we like to think so!

settings.heading: Discover more sustainable products by frank green
settings.row_content: Love shopping at frank green? Take a look at some of our other popular collections: 34 oz / 1L drink bottles, personalised bottles, and iced coffee cups.
